title: Set
description: A set of Yu-Gi-Oh cards. Sets may be physical (booster pack, structure deck, promo card list, etc) or virtual (Master Duel pack, etc).

id.description: The UUID of this set. The name of the set's file should be this UUID.

date.description: The release date for this product, if known. Only used in virtual sets.

name.description: A mapping of language to set names. In physical sets, if the locales object has a mapping for this language, then this name is official, else it is unofficial.

locales.description: A mapping of locale to locale-specific information. Only used in physical sets.

language.description: The default language for this product. Individual cards may have different languages.

prefix.description: The card code prefix for this locale. This should be everything before the number part of the card code. This includes the dash, if no language code is present! If null, indicates that this locale did not use card codes at all, a la old OCG sets.

date.description: The release date for this product, if known.

image.description: A URL to a image of this set in this locale, if available. Use this in preference to the 'image' field in 'contents'.

boxImage.description: A URL to a image of this set's booster box in this locale, if available. Use this in preference to the 'image' field in 'contents'.

cardImages.description: A mapping of editions (as per the edition enumeration, or the empty string if no edition) to sets of card images in this locale.

additionalProperties.description: A mapping of printing UUIDs to images of that card's specific printing in this locale.
A URL to a full image of this card.

externalIDs.description: IDs and other information, to access this set from various other sites.

dbIDs.description: Any official Yugioh database IDs for this product.

items.description: An official Yugioh database ID for this product.

contents.description: The contents of this set. These contents might differ by locale. Virtual sets have just one entry here.

locales.description: The locales these contents apply to. Not present in virtual packs.

formats.description: The formats in which this set was printed into.

distrobution.description: Either a keyword, or the UUID of the distrobution method of this set, if known: was it a pack, deck, promo card, etc. Look it up in the distributions JSON. As for keywords: The keyword 'preconstructed' means to give all cards in order, like a deck.

packsPerBox.description: How many packs are included per booster box. Used only if this is a pack that can come in boxes.

hasHobbyRetailDifferences.description: Set this to true if this pack has hobby and retail booster boxes, and thier contents may differ with regard to thier secret/ultimate rares.

editions.description: What editions of this set were released? At least one is required in physical TCG (and some OCG) sets. This is not present in virtual sets.

image.description: A URL to a image of this set, if available. Use the 'image' field in 'locales' first if also available.

boxImage.description: A URL to a image of this set's booster box, if available. Use the 'image' field in 'locales' first if also available.

removedCards.description: Cards that were in this set, but have been removed. Used only in virtual sets.

externalIDs.description: IDs and other information, to access this card from various other sites.

id.description: The internal ID in YGOProDeck for this set.

name.description: The slug for YGOProDeck you can use after 'ygoprodeck.com/pack/' to get the set's page.

history.description: Physical sets have a release date. Virtual sets, furthermore, may also be revoked, and even re-added, at Konami's whim. This array of periods of availability tracks both.

items.description: A span of time this set was (or is, or will be) available.

startDate.description: The date this set was made available. Optional, if you don't know when it debuted.

endDate.description: The date this set was revoked. Optional, if it is still available.

externalIDs.description: IDs and other information, to access this set from various other sites.

id.description: The internal wiki ID for the Yugipedia page for this set.

name.description: The Yugipedia page name for this set.

yugiohpricesName.description: The name of this set on YugiohPrices. TCG only.
